thread.section_title: Snowgoose Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snowgoose | snowgoose.com.au
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text:
I have ordered Snowgoose products for many years and have always been delighted to hear from the people to whom I have sent one of your boxes that they were thrilled with the contents - all commented on the top quality.
I also have been the recipient of Snowgoose hampers and have never been disappointed.
Staff on the phone have always been extremely helpful and I have been impressed when I have been informed if fruit not up to standard so have been given another option. Have found order site difficult if wanting to order several boxes each to be delivered to a different recipient but pay for all at once.
